snippet.title: A Forgetful Loop: Trailer
snippet.description:
A time-looping, worker-placement puzzle game: https://bighandinsky.itch.io/forgetful-loop

Available on PC, Mac & Linux.

Set in a distant future, Forgetful Loop has you fixing a time machine gone wrong - where you can follow the team's experiences being stuck in a loop for far longer than any human should. Curious to see where this game originated? Check out the jam version here! https://bighandinsky.itch.io/gmtk2020
